minor.comment: Change extensions APIs from beta to public: BaseFieldCustomizer, BaseListViewCommandSet, ColumnAccessor, Command, FieldCustomizerContext, IFieldCustomizerCellEventParameters, IListViewCommandSetExecuteEventParameters, IListViewCommandSetListViewUpdatedParameters, ListItemAccessor, ListViewAccessor, ListViewCommandSetContext, RowAccessor, SelectedRowsChangedEventArgs.

Remove depreacted API items: 'onRefreshCommand' instead use 'onListViewUpdated()', 'CellFormatter', fields from 'IFieldCustomizerCellEventParameters', 'IListViewCommandSetExecuteEventParameters.commandId' instead use 'itemId', and 'IListViewCommandSetRefreshEventParameters' instead use 'onListViewUpdated()'.

major.comment: Use lockstep version for all SPFx packages
Update APIs for extension RC0 release
